text: Royal Albert DLR station is a station on the Docklands Light Railway (DLR) in the Docklands area of East London, England. The station serves the western end of the north quay of the Royal Albert Dock, from which it takes its name. London City Airport can be seen from the station. The station is located on an elevated section of the DLR's Beckton branch, between Prince Regent and Beckton Park stations. It is in Travelcard Zone 3. Category:Docklands Light Railway stations in the London Borough of Newham
title: Royal Albert DLR station
